validate_pf module¶

class validate_pf.ValidatePF[source]¶

Bases: object

Methods for validating EINs from IRS form 990 PF.

Each method called by validate_pf represents the validation of one column, and comes with the kwarg fixer_display=False, which when set to True will return only a string representation of the equation. This is for use in the validation fixer tool.

Note that the PF data was never validated before, in the old SQL code. These were all added based strictly on sums given by the IRS form itself.
